channel.title: European Arbitration Chamber - News
channel.description: Latest news and updates from the European Arbitration Chamber (EAC)

item.title: EAC General Meeting 2024
item.description: The European Arbitration Chamber held its annual general meeting with important updates on arbitration procedures and new member initiatives.

item.title: New Arbitration Rules Update
item.description: Important updates to the EAC arbitration rules have been implemented to improve efficiency and transparency in dispute resolution.

item.title: Art Expertise Services Launch
item.description: The EAC announces the launch of comprehensive art expertise services including authentication, appraisal, and passport documentation.

item.title: EAC Council Expansion
item.description: The European Arbitration Chamber welcomes new council members to enhance international arbitration services across Europe.

item.title: Digital Transformation Initiative
item.description: EAC introduces new digital platforms to streamline arbitration processes and improve accessibility for international clients.

item.title: COVID-19 Response Measures
item.description: The European Arbitration Chamber adapts its services to continue providing essential arbitration support during the global pandemic.
